short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show translated words on a tooltip using Google Translate saved phrases.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you logged in with your Google account, you are able to save translations with the star icon.

This plugin manages to access this word list. When you open a webpage, detect the language and search for word matches with your dictionary. If successful, translate them and display on a popup on mouse hover.
